cluster_classes.class_description: Technological systems that use artificial intelligence to monitor or track individuals or groups, such as facial recognition used for surveillance purposes.
cluster_classes.evidence_excerpt: facial recognition technology can be used for surveillance purposes

members.entity_description: AI-based technology that identifies or verifies individuals using their facial features.
Use of technologies to monitor or track individuals or groups.

cluster_classes.class_description: Concepts and systems related to artificial intelligence as a technological field, including the core technology and its concrete technological applications in society.
cluster_classes.evidence_excerpt: AI technologies as concrete systems and Artificial Intelligence as the core technological field.

members.entity_description: Technological systems, tools, and applications that use artificial intelligence methods and algorithms and are deployed across industries and daily life.
A rapidly advancing technological field that is revolutionizing industries and daily life.

splits.name: Surveillance Purposes
splits.description: Use cases, goals, and purposes for which surveillance is conducted, such as monitoring or tracking individuals or groups.

args.justification: ClsC_01330fd0 mixes an AI-based surveillance technology (facial recognition technology) with a non-technology use-case concept (surveillance purposes); splitting isolates the purpose-oriented entity into its own coherent class.

args.new_description: AI-based technological systems used for surveillance, such as facial recognition technology deployed to monitor or track individuals or groups.
args.justification: After removing the use-case entity, ClsC_01330fd0 is now purely about AI surveillance technologies and should be explicitly positioned in the broader Artificial Intelligence Technologies & Applications group.

args.new_description: The technological field of artificial intelligence and its concrete systems, tools, and applications deployed across industries and daily life.
args.justification: ClsC_48eeb186 covers the general AI technology domain, which is the natural umbrella for all AI applications including surveillance; assigning it to the same Artificial Intelligence Technologies & Applications group aligns related AI technology classes.

args.new_description: Concepts describing the purposes or goals of surveillance activities (e.g., monitoring or tracking individuals or groups), independent of specific technologies used.
args.remark: This class currently has only one member entity ('surveillance purposes'); future ingestion may populate additional AI-related surveillance use cases here.
args.justification: The new split class contains a non-technological use-case concept closely tied to AI surveillance applications, so it should be clearly labeled as a use-case class and grouped with related AI technologies and applications.

executed_decisions.justification: ClsC_01330fd0 mixes an AI-based surveillance technology (facial recognition technology) with a non-technology use-case concept (surveillance purposes); splitting isolates the purpose-oriented entity into its own coherent class.

executed_decisions.justification: ClsC_48eeb186 covers the general AI technology domain, which is the natural umbrella for all AI applications including surveillance; assigning it to the same Artificial Intelligence Technologies & Applications group aligns related AI technology classes.
